---

import { LightTheme } from './light-theme';

Light theme values for our [Bit theming system](https://bit.dev/teambit/design/ui/theme/base-theme).

### Component usage

```js
<LightTheme>
  <div>...</div>
</LightTheme>
```

### Render a component in light

<LightTheme style={{ padding: 8 }}>Hello world!</LightTheme>
